sections.heading: Procedure for inventory; proces verbal; returnIn so far as applicable, Articles 3131 through 3134 shall govern the procedure for the taking of the inventory, proces verbal, and the return and effect of the proces verbal
sections.text: Procedure for inventory; proces verbal; returnIn so far as applicable, Articles 3131 through 3134 shall govern the procedure for the taking of the inventory, proces verbal, and the return and effect of the proces verbal.
